turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me place an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a iced vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Warrington on Easton Road in Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti iced vanilla latte with soy milk to be picked up at the starbucks on easton road, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the drink, can you put in can you specify Light Ice?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can note that on your order.
